paragraphs: Increases all bullet damage by 50% for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Grants an extra life, reviving the player with 100% HP once upon death.
Gain the ability to dodge by pressing **X**, defaults to upwards. becoming invulnerable while dodging. Cooldown: 0.5 seconds.
Increase atttack damage the closer you are to the boss, up to 100%.
Heal 50% of max HP. Cooldown: 30 seconds.
Regenerate 5% of max HP every 15 seconds.
Active Ability: The World! Stop before me!
Slow time by 50% for a duration of 6 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
For every 0.5 seconds the player doesn’t fire, the next shot deals an additional 2 damage, up to 9.
Active Ability: Thou shall not pass
Reflect 5 closest incoming projectiles, sending them back at the boss with double damage. Cooldown: 6 seconds.
Gain one percent of damage reduction based on every percent of missing HP, up to 75%.
Gain an unbreakable shield that absorbs all damage for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 15 seconds.
Fire a massive shot that deals bonus damage based on how much health the boss has lost. For each percent of the boss’s health missing, the shot deals 3% more damage. Cooldown: 8 seconds.
For every 1% of health the player loses, the next shot deals 1 additional damage, up to 100. The bonus is consumed after firing.
